nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 10 is the tenth issue in the comic book series Star Wars Adventures. The issue contains "Powered Down, Part I" by Cavan Scott, which continues the story featured in Star Wars Adventures Free Comic Book Day 2018, and "Tales from Wild Space: Family Affair, Part 1" by Elsa Charretier and Pierrick Colinet. The comic was released by IDW Publishing on May 9, 2018.

"Powered Down" Part 1 (of 2). Han and Chewie are on the run from bounty hunters and take refuge on a planet that mysteriously shuts down all electronics. With no way off the planet, will our favorite scruffy duo be able to evade their pursuers and save themselves?
